skills.title: Communication
skills.description: Effective communication is my forte. I bridge technical and non-technical gaps, actively listen, and foster innovation and adaptability in my projects.

skills.title: Coding
skills.description: Coding is my canvas for creation. Mastering languages like C, C++, HTML/CSS, Java, and Python equips me to craft art, solve problems, and bring my imagination to life.

skills.title: Problem-solving
skills.description: I excel in problem-solving, identifying root causes and devising efficient solutions. Whether debugging or other challenges, I rely on patience, creativity, and critical thinking for effective solutions.

skills.title: Multitasking
skills.description: Efficient multitasking is my strength. I excel in juggling multiple projects, staying organized, and prioritizing tasks for productive and timely project delivery.
